products.name: Air Jordan 4 Retro White Cement
products.description: Sepatu basket ikonik yang dirilis pada tahun 1989, menampilkan desain timeless dengan unit Air-sole yang terlihat dan panel jaring yang khas.

products.name: Air Jordan 3 Retro J Balvin Rio
products.description: The Jordan 3 Retro J Balvin Rio perfectly blends the classic Jordan 3 design with J Balvin's signature flair. Featuring a predominantly black upper, this sneaker is brought to life with solar flare and total crimson abyss accents that capture the vibrant energy of J Balvinâ€™s music.

products.name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High Fragment
products.description: The Jordan 1 Retro Fragment is a retro-inspired collaborative sneaker by the Jordan Brand and Fragment design.

products.name: Nike SB Dunk Low Nasty Boys
products.description: The Nike SB Dunk Low Nasty Boys is a low-top shoe that pays homage to the Nasty Boys, the trio of pitchers for the Cincinnati Reds baseball team in the 1990 World Series.

products.name: adidas Samba OG Cloud White Core Black
products.description: The adidas Samba OG Cloud White Core Black (Women's) represents a contemporary take on a timeless style, emanating an aesthetic charm that goes beyond its original athletic purpose.
